ch0116_00_hikari_salon/8201_2003_01_10:
I feel like I can do anything as long as I’m with
you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0116_00_hikari_salon/8201_2101_01_10: Hey! You can have this, if you like!
ch0116_00_hikari_salon/8201_2101_02_10: I think you’ll be able to use it well!
ch0116_00_hikari_salon/8201_2102_01_10: Ta-da! I’ve got a great present for you!
ch0116_00_hikari_salon/8201_2102_02_10:
I’m sure you’ll need it sometime, so hold on to it
and use it when the time is right!
ch0116_00_hikari_salon/8201_2103_02_10:
I was a bit worried whether you’d like it or not,
so my heart was racing!
ch0116_00_hikari_salon/8201_2103_03_10: After all, it’s a special present for you!
ch0116_00_hikari_salon/8201_2201_01_10: Would you like to chat for a bit?
ch0116_00_hikari_salon/8201_2203_01_10:
Time sure flies when I’m chatting with you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0116_00_hikari_salon/8201_2302_01_10: Oh, a present for me? Thank you! I love it!
ch0116_00_hikari_salon/8201_2301_01_10: What a great present! Thank you so much!
ch0116_00_hikari_salon/8201_2301_02_10:
Thanks for thinking of me and for this special gift,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! I’ll take good care
of it!
ch0116_00_hikari_salon/8201_2402_01_10: That was so much fun! Let’s talk again sometime!
ch0116_00_hikari_salon/8201_2401_01_10:
You’re a natural at telling stories,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0116_00_hikari_salon/8201_2401_02_10:
I had such a nice time talking with you! Let’s chat
again sometime!
ch0116_00_hikari_salon/8001_0701_01_10:
I feel so relaxed whenever I’m here... It feels just
like being in my own home.
ch0116_00_hikari_salon/8001_0701_02_10:
I have to be careful not to get TOO comfortable,
or I’ll look silly. *giggle*
ch0116_00_hikari_salon/8002_0701_01_10:
People who focus all their energy on one thing
have a bright shine to them, don’t they?
ch0116_00_hikari_salon/8002_0701_02_10:
For example, Lucas is like that when he’s working
hard as Professor Rowan’s assistant.
ch0116_00_hikari_salon/8002_0701_03_10: I can’t seem to choose just one thing to focus on...
ch0116_00_hikari_salon/8002_0701_04_10:
But I guess that’s not the worst thing I could
be worried about. It means I have so many
fun things to do!
ch0116_00_hikari_salon/8003_0701_01_10: Exercise is the best way to lift your spirits!
ch0116_00_hikari_salon/8003_0701_02_10:
After a tough hike up a mountain, you’re rewarded
with the best view from the summit!
ch0116_00_hikari_salon/8003_0701_03_10:
I know! If you ever plan on visiting Sinnoh,
we should climb Mount Coronet together!
